attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drivers parking their cars on the roadside should not be allowed to do so for any longer.
It is very dangerous for both road users and pedestrians.
The roads are not wide enough and it is more likely to cause accidents. When pedestrians want to cross the road and there is no nearby traffic lights it is very unsafe as they dont have a good view on the traffic.
